article: Mary:Hello, Helen! Can you give me some  _  about learning English? Helen: Of course. Mary : I want to learn English  _  . But I'm not good at reading and  _  Helen : Why  _  you write down the correct spelling next to the  _  ? Mary : OK. Can you give me some other advice? Helen : You  _  read a newspaper in English every day. Try  to write  eight or ten  _  a day. Mary : What else? Helen : You can talk about the films or songs  _  your friends.
